statements: SELECT * FROM verification_tokens WHERE user_id = 1 AND token_id = 123;
SELECT token_value, generated_at FROM verification_tokens WHERE expiry_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, token_id, token_value FROM verification_tokens ORDER BY generated_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tokens FROM verification_tokens WHERE token_value LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT * FROM verification_tokens WHERE expiry_at < '2022-12-31' AND generated_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, token_value FROM verification_tokens WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT token_id, generated_at FROM verification_tokens WHERE expiry_at > NOW();
SELECT * FROM verification_tokens ORDER BY generated_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tokens FROM verification_tokens WHERE expiry_at < NOW();
SELECT user_id, token_id, token_value, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(generated_at) AS epoch_generated_at FROM verification_tokens WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY token_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM user_devices WHERE device_type='mobile';
SELECT token_id, user_id, timestamp FROM verification_tokens WHERE token_code='ABC123';
SELECT * FROM user_devices WHERE device_type='laptop' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(device_id) FROM user_devices GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM verification_tokens WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT token_code, timestamp FROM verification_tokens WHERE token_code LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM user_devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' AND user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM verification_tokens WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT token_id, token_code FROM verification_tokens WHERE timestamp < '2022-06-01 12:00:00' ORDER BY token_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM verification_tokens ORDER BY expiration_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, success FROM login_attempts WHERE success = false;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY attempt_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM verification_tokens WHERE expiration_time > NOW();
SELECT id, token FROM verification_tokens;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = '123456789';
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, timestamp, success FROM login_attempts WHERE success = false;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM verification_tokens WHERE expiration_time > NOW();
SELECT id, user_id, token FROM verification_tokens WHERE user_id = 'example_user_id';
SELECT user_id, token, expiration_time FROM verification_tokens WHERE expiration_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM verification_tokens ORDER BY expiration_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, question_text FROM users JOIN security_questions ON users.user_id = security_questions.question_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT u.username, l.success FROM users u JOIN login_attempts l ON u.user_id = l.user_id WHERE l.success = false;
